content: Screening assessment copy with answer key included
Screening assessment scores are entered for each item and each student in the same excel format as demonstrated in class. Instructional level is also included
Lesson Plans are typed and up to date, and include: lesson objective, learning set, new material, guided practice, independent practice, and data-based decision making.
Data are entered daily (source, # questions, % score, obj.) for all students, and are up to date.
Peer coaching observations and reflection records are up to date (in binder in the classroom, not in google notebook)
Goals and objectives are included. Objectives include conditions, observable behaviors, criteria for acceptable performance, and evaluation procedures.
A sample progress monitoring assessment that will be used is included
Progress Monitoring data entered for one assessment (for whole class)

End of semester summary of progress is included: 20 points for reflection on teaching practices, 30 points for reflection on student progress (15 points daily data, 15 points progress monitoring data).
